full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN SA SKYA'I LAS TSOGS GSAR BRTZAMS LAS, BYAD KHA 'BUM BZLOG GI CHO GA GSAL BYED TSA ZER 'BUM PHRAG ZHES BYA BA'I CHO GA PHYIR BZLOG GDAMS PA GNYIS ZAB BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017B (CES SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYI GTER GZHUNG GI KHA BSKONG DU, LAS TSOGS GSAR RTZOM PA'I YAN LAG RNYED MA'I CHO GA BYA SLA ZHES TSIGS CHUNG BA PHAN DON CHE BA, DNGOS GSAL BA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES GRUB CHEN AA MO GHA BADZRA, BAL PO'I SNGAGS PA PHYVA LDAN, DBU MDZAD NOR BU SHES RAB, DRUNG YIG PA PADMA'I DRAG PO RNAMS KYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR, AA NANTA MAH'A SHRIS BAL BOD KYI GTER YIG DANG, @018A *, ,MKHAS SGRUB TSAD LDAN RNAMS KYI YIG CHA 'GA' ZHIG DANG, GONG MA KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN GYI LAS TSOGS BYAD KHA 'BUM BZLOG GI CHO GA LAS LEGS CHA BLANGS TE PHYOGS GCIG TU DRIL BA GDAMS PA KUN GYI ZAB MO, GU RU DRAG PO'I SNYING KHRAG LTAR DKON PAS BKA' RGYA BTAB PA'I GDAMS NGAG TSA ZER 'BUM PHRAG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI PADMA PHUG GI GTER CHOS KHANG DU SBYAR BA'O, ,)
